content_excerpt:
Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
21 April 2025 at 16:18
To: BoxOffice <boxoffice@brightonfringe.org>
Cc: Joanna Jarvie <joannalouisejarvie@gmail.com>, Take Part <takepart@brightonfringe.org>
I wasnt made aware of this, is it down to me to pay this? If it was made clear to the acts and i wasn't informed, i’m realising now that this
is going to cause a lot issues, just seen its not mentioned in the venue managers agreement we were told to agree on before re
registering each venue this year, risk assessment for changes in ticketing structure seem to have been overlooked 
Thanks ben 
[Quoted text hidden]
